text: The Schindler Group is a Swiss company that makes escalators, moving walkways, and elevators worldwide. It was founded in Switzerland in 1874. The company is seen in more than 140 countries and hires more than 58,000 persons worldwide. The production facilities are located in Brazil, China, Slovakia, Spain, Switzerland, India and the United States. ==References== Category:19th-century establishments in Switzerland Category:1874 establishments in Europe Category:Companies of Switzerland Category:Lucerne
title: Schindler Group
